CustomField.formula: IF( /*配車完了と配車完了以降の状態：falseを返す*/ OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "DispatchCompleted"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "DeliveryCompleted"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancel"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "InvoiceConfirmed") ), false, NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(TransportationMode__c)) || ISBLANK(LoadingDate__c) || ISBLANK(DispatchDetail_Cnt__c) ) && ISPICKVAL(TransportationMode__c, "Charter") && ( ( ( ISBLANK(ShippingCompany__c) || NOT(ISPICKVAL(ShippingCompany__r.Type, "Subcontractor")) ) && ( ISBLANK(DriverMaster__c) || ISBLANK(VehicleNumber__c) ) ) || ( NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingCompany__c)) && ISPICKVAL(ShippingCompany__r.Type, "Subcontractor") ) ) && NOW() > DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(LoadingDate__c - 1) & " 3:00:00") && DispatchDetail_Cnt__c > 0 )
CustomField.label: 配車組み遅延フラグ
